main: ^Oh Hi, You must be the Detective, thanks for coming.
^Nice to meet you, whats your Name?
Greet: ^I'm Charlotte, Peter's wife. Please find out who did this to my husband.
reply: ^I don't really know anything, all i could tell you is that the past couple of days Peter was pretty distant.
reply1: ^Once again please figure out what happened here, I don't want anyone else in this town to go through what i'm going through
